name: M-Way Solutions
tag_list: mobile-enterprise-software, mobile-enterprise-services, connected-vehicle, mdm, mobile-infrastructure, m-commerce, mobile-crm, enterprise-apps, mobile-consulting
overview:
M-Way Solutions is a leading provider of mobile enterprise software and services. The company enables medium and large sized businesses to mobilize employees as well as company processes and data.

M-Way Solutions offers mobile back-end (such as its Mobile Enterprise Application Platform) and applications across all platforms and devices.

M-Way Solutions is currently active in two major fields of business:

  1. Mobile enterprise software: infrastructure (MEAP), mobile CRM, mobile enterprise workflows, m-commerce solutions, enterprise app stores/ MDM, enterprise apps and mobile consulting (strategy, concept and implementation).
  2. Mobile Automotive: connected vehicle services/ services and mobility solutions, etc.

To date, M-Way products have been taken on by leading international brands of various industries such as BMW, Toyota, Merck, Roche, Adidas, Agero and DEKRA.

The company was founded in 2004 in Stuttgart, Germany, and operates on a global scale. M-Way Solutions has a development office in Kosice, Slovakia as well as worldwide partners. They are also currently setting up an American Headquarters in Boston, USA.
